metadata.title: CVE-2019-10913 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Symfony before 2.7.51, 2.8.x before 2.8.50, 3.x before 3.4.26, 4.xbefore 4.1.12, and 4.2.x before 4.2.7, HTTP Methods provided as verbs orusing the override header may be treated as trusted input, but they are notvalidated, possibly causing SQL injection or XSS. This is related tosymfony/http-foundation.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
